name: Sonoma County Transit: Paratransit
fullDescription: Sonoma County Transit provides ADA paratransit service for Sonoma County residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service throughout Sonoma County
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the paratransit eligibility application
2. Application at sctransit.com
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: Sonoma County Transit, paratransit, ADA, Sonoma County, disability, wheelchair, door to door
